title: Consider Peer Feedback
text: Peer feedback can provide a fresh perspective on the clarity of the slides.

title: Avoid Overconfidence
text: Relying solely on personal judgment may overlook potential areas of confusion.

title: Simplify Language
text: Using complex language might confuse the audience rather than impress them.

title: Importance of Review
text: Skipping the review process can lead to unnoticed errors in the presentation.

hintAnswer: Ask a colleague to review the slides
title: Best Strategy for Clarity
text: The most effective strategy involves seeking external feedback to ensure clarity.
choices: Ask a colleague to review the slides.
Use complex language to impress the audience.
